info.title: UrLBae
info.description: URLBae allows you to seamlessly track your audience with simple and easy-to-remember yet powerful links and provide your customers a unique tailored experience. Want an Instagram Bio Page? We can do that too! QR Code for Crypto? We have you covered. All completely free!

get.description: To get information on the account, you can send a request to this endpoint and it will return data on the account.

put.description: To update information on the account, you can send a request to this endpoint and it will update data on the account.

get.description: To get your branded domains codes via the API, you can use this endpoint.

post.description: A domain can be added using this endpoint. You need to send the pixel type and the tag.

put.description: A branded domain can be updated using this endpoint.

delete.description: To delete a domain, you need to send a request to this endpoint.

get.description: To get custom splash pages via the API, you can use this endpoint.
To get call-to-action overlays via the API, you can use this endpoint
To get your links via the API, you can use this endpoint.
To get details for a single link via the API, you can use this endpoint.

post.description: To shorten a single link via the API, you can use this endpoint.

put.description: To update a link via the API, you can use this endpoint.

delete.description: To delete a link, you can use this endpoint.

get.description: To get your pixels codes via the API, you can use this endpoint.

post.description: A pixel can be created using this endpoint. You need to send the pixel type and the tag.

put.description: To update a pixel via the API, you can use this endpoint.

delete.description: To delete a pixel via the API, you can use this endpoint.

get.description: To get your QR codes via the API, you can use this endpoint.

Direct, email and other.description: The direct, email and other contacts.
Direct, email and other.title: Direct, Email and Other

get.description: To get details for a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

post.description: To get create a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

put.description: To update a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

delete.description: To delete a single QR code via the API, you can use this endpoint.

get.description: Get a list of all plans on the platform. This endpoint is only accessible by users with admin privileges.

put.summary: Subscribe a user to a plan
put.description: To subscribe a user to plan, send a PUT request to this endpoint with the plan id and user id. The type of subscription and the expiration date will need to be specified. If the expiration date is not specified, the date will be adjusted according to the type.

get.description: Get a list of all users on the platform. This endpoint is only accessible by users with admin privileges.
Get data for a single user.

post.description: To create a user, use this endpoint.

delete.description: To delete a user, use this endpoint.
